DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate renal function compare Certican base immunosuppressive regimen two different CNIs ( Tacrolimus Cyclosporin A ) versus standard treatment Mycophenolic Acid Tacrolimus de novo renal transplant recipient .
DOC.brief_title: 12 Month Athena Study : Everolimus vs. Standard Regimen de Novo Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient receive primary secondary kidney transplant Patients willing write informed consent obtain kidney allograft cold ischemia time ( CIT ) < 30 hour negative pregnancy test prior study enrollment Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply Multiorgan recipient former Graft loss due immunological reason Patients receive kidney nonheart beat donor AB0 incompatible transplant current Panel Reactive Antibody ( PRA ) level > 20 % exist antibody HLAtype receive transplant know hypersensitivity/contraindication immunosuppressant Use investigational drug Patients thrombocytopenia ( platelet < 100,000/mm³ ) , absolute neutrophil count < 2,000/mm³ leucopenia ( leucocytes < 3,000/mm³ ) , hemoglobin < 8 g/dL significant mental illness history malignancy last five year HIV positive uncontrolled hypercholesterolemia hypertriglyceridemia drug alcohol abuse pregnant breast feeding woman
